snippet.title: Bertram Fiddle - A Dreadly Business - Ipad Gameplay
snippet.description:
Hello Adventure Fans
Here is a first look at Episode 1 of A Dreadly Business. My very first point and click game.
For more information visit www.bertramfiddle.com

https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/bertram-fiddle-episode-1-dreadly/id930404329?mt=8
or for PC on Steam
http://store.steampowered.com/app/354680
